login.description: TON wallet allows you to make fast and secure blockchain-based payments without intermediaries.

connect.title: Enter the secret key
connect.description:
To restore access, enter the 24 secret words
you received when creating a wallet

create.title: Take a pen and paper
create.description: Get ready to write down the secret key. This is the only way to regain access to the wallet. It's safest not to store key on devices.

secret.title: Your secret key
secret.description: Write these 24 words in exactly that order and hide them in a safe place.

secret_check.title: Let's check
secret_check.description: To make sure you spelled the words correctly, enter words

new_password.title: Enter password
new_password.description:
Create a password to enter the
application and perform operations.

change_password.title: Change password
change_password.description:
Create a new password to enter the
application and perform operations.

congratulations.title: Congratulations!
congratulations.description: Your wallet has been successfully created

wallet.add_token_description:
You can always add custom tokens
to our wallet to manage them.

add_tokens.title: Import Tokens
add_tokens.search_description: Add the tokens you've acquired using DEX
add_tokens.custom_description: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens. Learn more about scams and security risks.
add_tokens.confirm_description: Would you like to import these tokens?

settings.reset_wallet_confirm: Are you really want to reset wallet?

sending.title: Transaction processing
sending.description: This may take a few minutes, please be patient.
